item.title: Use your pocket notebook as a coaster
item.description: A small tale of how an insignificant example repeated in a bunch of YouTube videos made me significantly improve my note-taking habit. Now I carry with me a pocket notebook everywhere I go, and I can take quick notes without any friction.

item.title: Beginning of a writing journey
item.description: I’ve always struggled with pure creativity, and I’d like to improve. So, I decided to analyse my current situation and come up with a plan to start a continuous creative practice: writing.

item.title: Send Large JSON Data to IoT Hub Using MQTT
item.description: How to program an Arduino 33 IoT board to communicate with Microsoft Azure, through IoT Hub and Stream Analytics. In particular, I explain a workaround to send JSON files bigger than 256 B.
